name: Roblox: Block Tales HUD
description:
The most accurate block tales hud in fnf
- Block Tales by UnknownNamedGuy and the Spaceman Moonbase Team
- HUD and Mod Icon by n_bonnie2 (Mod Icon based on the heavily crushed card on FNF Weekly: Tweakmas)
- Most, if not all, assets were ripped from the Roblox GameCache as a result of playing Block Tales.
